domains.title:
§ Confidentiality
【C1.1】 The entity identifies and maintains confidential information to meet the entity’s objectives related to confidentiality.

controls.title: Data Classification Model
controls.summary: Data classification model is defined to differentiate public, non-public, confidential/sensitive and critical data or information asset.

controls.title: Privacy, Terms and Consent Notices
controls.summary: The organization has published privacy policy and established user consent process for data processing, in line with applicable regulations.

controls.title: Data Inventory and Lifecycle Management
controls.summary: Data is tagged according to its classification, and its lifecycle is defined. Transient and temporary data (or cache) is purged immediately after use.

controls.title: Protecting Data At Rest
controls.summary: Sensitive and confidential data is encrypted when stored.

controls.title: Protecting Data In Transit
controls.summary: Sensitive and confidential data is encrypted when transmitted across networks.

controls.title: Protecting Data In Use
controls.summary: Audit trail is enabled to monitor data access when in use.

controls.title: Data Protection Implementation and Processes
controls.summary: Data is protected according to its classification and storage capability, including encryption, access control, partitioning/separation, backup/recovery, and monitoring.

controls.title: Data Handling Process
controls.summary: Data is handled according to its classification, including defined requirements for labeling, encryption, access control, retention and other applicable processes.

controls.title: Production Data Access
controls.summary: Access to production data is highly restricted. Access is reviewed and approved on a case-by-case basis. MFA is required.

domains.title:
§ Confidentiality
【C1.2】 The entity disposes of confidential information to meet the entity’s objectives related to confidentiality.

controls.title: Data Deletion Procedures
controls.summary: Data is retained for designated periods of time according to regulatory and/or contractual requirements, and deleted when the retention period expires.

controls.title: Data Handling Process
controls.summary: Data is handled according to its classification, including defined requirements for labeling, encryption, access control, retention and other applicable processes.

controls.title: Data Inventory and Lifecycle Management
controls.summary: Data is tagged according to its classification, and its lifecycle is defined. Transient and temporary data (or cache) is purged immediately after use.

controls.title: Media Disposal Process
controls.summary: Media containing critical / sensitive data (such as PII or ePHI) is disposed securely.
